name: RDA-Arachnophobia-Free
description:
RDA-Arachnophobia-Free is a small window into the huge world of RDA (Red Dawn Apocalyps) and it's numerous playable episodes, owned and produced by Oztronix Studios,  Team OZAV, and VranicStudios3000, which are the same and one integrated publisher, using the today's most popular Unity 3D engine. In this free playable RDA episode (sequel) - you are stuck on the one of the Entity bases in the outer space and need to discover what is going on, as with the most of the RDA playable sequels. This episode has unlimited game play, you can stay, explore and fight in some areas for  indefinite time, or restart the map each time by going close to and touching the hidden flying disk at the bottom part of the caves. The player protective haz-mat suit can protect you from some damages, but not for too long, so every caution is advised, as to what Hidden Entity creations you may run into, trying to discover about more of their constantly ongoing experimental programs, and they have setup around in order to stop you. As always in RDA - occasional help and tips from Taxon Industries can be found around the map, and the clues that Taxon (presidential candidate fighting the infection and Entity in the RDA zones) have left for you while roaming around earlier, to leave you with enough helpful clues and support. The gameplay can be paused but not saved and game will restart each time after losing a player life. This free sequel is a very small window into the huge world of RDA. The RDA game serial has about 200+ playable episodes, which we hope to offer via Itch.io first, and further, as more becomes available in the future as well. No any camera effects are used and only camera used in RDA - is proudly - the original Unity 3D camera.

Since RDA framework is too large to be ever published as a single game  - it has been decided that - various playable episodes in many game styles are published separately instead from it, some for free, some for donation, some paid, or in-between, and all for the gamers and collectionaries pleasure. We prefer publishing as the .exe setup files, for the simplicity of deployments, stability and easy usablity.  RDA playable episodes (each by it's own game style and thematics, for the every next episode (sequel) are the best playable via game pads,  for the best experience, along with the vibration features and automatic game pad AAA layout inbuilt already, so the gamers don't lose any time for such inconveniences, or for too much interfaces, which is the another of the unique RDA features, making the RDA serial so popular as it is, today. RDA sequels (episodes) are also playable via keyboard-mouse, but RDA is not originally designed for that kind of game play, and primarily (to say it again): for the game pads, such as the XBox game pads or similar ones. RDA serial has it's inspiration in the early Valve serial of games, today well known as the HalfLife, OrangeBox for XBox, and especially HalfLife2 original games style, and in similar shooter-adventure epic game titles of the same quality and approx of the same games period. We hope that any playable episodes of RDA you can come across will truly fulfill your gaming afternoon or evening on a rainy day. Donations are accepted via itch.io usual methods and via PayPal, as well, depending on what distribution way you may run into any. We thank you for the time and interest for the RDA games serial.  So watch around: some of the new and fresh, coming RDA episodes - could be - just on it's way out there - as always, as we normally do - via the Itch.io - first. *** If any users run into any install problems, no need to turn off antivirus, but - just select "more info" and than "install anyway" on the windows security pop-up screen, *** We wish you all the best for the coming 2020-2021 season holidays and the new year, with this release version, that each may be also updated in the future, and - as we find more time around, for the updates, with our thanks for taking this (100% donation based) free intro episode into the huge world of RDA :).
